name: Deep Cleaning Service Package
description: Comprehensive deep cleaning for your entire home. Includes kitchen deep clean, bathroom sanitization, floor scrubbing, window cleaning, and dusting of all surfaces. Perfect for spring cleaning or moving in/out.

name: Regular House Cleaning
description: Weekly or bi-weekly house cleaning service. Includes vacuuming, mopping, dusting, bathroom cleaning, and kitchen cleanup. Maintain a spotless home with our reliable cleaning professionals.

name: Carpet & Upholstery Cleaning
description: Professional deep cleaning for carpets, rugs, and upholstery. Uses eco-friendly cleaning solutions and advanced equipment to remove stains, odors, and allergens. Restore your furniture to like-new condition.

name: Window Cleaning Service
description: Crystal clear windows inside and out. Professional window cleaning for residential properties. Includes window frames, sills, and tracks. Streak-free finish guaranteed.

name: Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning
description: Complete cleaning service for moving. Ensures your old or new home is spotless. Includes deep cleaning of all rooms, appliances, cabinets, and fixtures. Perfect for landlords and tenants.

name: Office Cleaning Service
description: Professional office cleaning to maintain a clean and healthy workspace. Includes desk cleaning, floor maintenance, restroom sanitization, and trash removal. Available daily, weekly, or monthly.

name: Post-Construction Cleanup
description: Thorough cleaning after construction or renovation projects. Removes dust, debris, paint splatters, and construction materials. Includes detailed cleaning of all surfaces, fixtures, and appliances.

name: Laundry & Dry Cleaning Service
description: Professional laundry and dry cleaning service. Pickup and delivery included. Handles delicate fabrics, suits, dresses, and everyday clothing. Pressed and folded to perfection.

name: HVAC Duct Cleaning
description: Professional air duct cleaning to improve indoor air quality. Removes dust, allergens, and debris from your HVAC system. Includes filter replacement and system inspection.

name: Gutter Cleaning Service
description: Complete gutter cleaning and maintenance. Removes leaves, debris, and blockages. Includes downspout cleaning and inspection. Prevents water damage and maintains proper drainage.

name: Pressure Washing Service
description: Professional pressure washing for driveways, patios, decks, and exterior walls. Removes dirt, grime, mold, and stains. Restores surfaces to their original appearance.

name: Pest Control Service
description: Comprehensive pest control treatment for common household pests. Safe and effective solutions for ants, roaches, rodents, and more. Includes initial treatment and follow-up visits.

name: Plumbing Maintenance Package
description: Regular plumbing maintenance to prevent costly repairs. Includes inspection, drain cleaning, leak detection, and minor repairs. Keeps your plumbing system running smoothly.

name: Electrical Safety Inspection
description: Professional electrical safety inspection for your home. Identifies potential hazards, checks wiring, outlets, and circuit breakers. Ensures your home meets safety standards.

name: Yard Maintenance Service
description: Regular lawn care and yard maintenance. Includes mowing, edging, trimming, leaf removal, and basic landscaping. Keep your yard looking beautiful year-round.

name: Appliance Repair Service
description: Expert repair service for major appliances. Covers refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, dryers, and ovens. Same-day service available. Warranty included on all repairs.

name: Handyman Service Package
description: Multi-service handyman package for various home repairs and improvements. Includes furniture assembly, picture hanging, minor repairs, and general maintenance tasks.

name: Home Organization Service
description: Professional home organization and decluttering service. Helps organize closets, kitchens, garages, and storage areas. Creates efficient systems for maintaining order.

name: Pet Care Service Package
description: Comprehensive pet care services including pet sitting, dog walking, and pet grooming. Experienced and loving care for your furry family members.

name: Senior Home Care Assistance
description: Compassionate home care assistance for seniors. Includes light housekeeping, meal preparation, companionship, and medication reminders. Helps seniors maintain independence.
